adept.common

Class DocumentSentiment

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.Item
      • adept.common.HltContent
        • adept.common.DocumentMentalState<SentimentMention>
          • adept.common.DocumentSentiment

  • public final class DocumentSentiment
extends DocumentMentalState<SentimentMention>

    Represents a sentiment at the level of participating document-level entities, relations, and arguments, rather than strings of text. The arguments of this class must necessarily be references to document-level entities, relations, relation arguments, or temporal values, i.e. instances of class Entity, Relation, adept.common.Relation.Filler, or TemporalValue.

    Objects of this class are associated with provenances that are instances of SentimentMention.

    This is a new class introduced in the API release version 2.1, and is the primary class to be used in inserting sentiments into the Adept KB.
